org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseCursorValue

defined in
org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseData
Lists the different cursors which can be set for the mouse pointer

Constructors

auto
Let the browser manage the mouse cursor
custom(imageDOMObject : org.silex.runtime.domObject.DOMObject,hotSpot : org.silex.runtime.geom.Point)
uses a custom bitmap cursor set with an image dom object. The hotSpot is the registration point of the cursor.
native(nativeOSMouseCursorValue : NativeOSMouseCursorValue)
Use a native OS mouse cursor
none
Hides the mouse cursor
